attributes.action: Convert the existing single lane A421 from M1 J13 to Bedford, into a Dual Carriageway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, the A421 from M1 J13 to Bedford is extremely congested and a journey which should take less than 10 minutes takes nearly 45 minutes most of the time. It would be immensely useful to commuters if the A421 is converted into a dual carriageway till the Bedford Southern Bypass
